title: An ansvver to the first part of a certaine conference, concerning succession, published not long since vnder the name of R. Dolman
author: Hayward, John, Sir, 1564?-1627.
publisher: Imprinted [by Eliot's Court Press, R. Bradock, P. Short, T. Snodham, R. Field, and J. Harrison] for Simon Waterson, and Cuthbert Burbie,
notes: A reply to: A conference about the next succession to the crowne of Ingland.
"Eliot's Court Press pr[inted]. piA, Bradock A-C, Short D-G, Snodham H-L, Field M-P, and Harrison Q-V"--STC.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
Some copies have slip-cancels on F2r line 5, I2v lines 24,25, and I4r line 16.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
